name: 邱家吉
objective: 本課程主要介紹：(1) 靜力學基礎知識；(2) 材料受到張力、壓力、剪力、扭力及彎曲等外力狀態下之應力及應變；(3) 學習如何透過莫耳圓分析材料於不同應力狀態下之主應力、主應變以及各方向之應力；(4) 了解平面應力及平面應變之差異與計算。
schedule:
Week 1 Introduction
Week 2 Review of Statics
Week 3 Review of Statics
Week 4 Review of Statics 
Week 5 Tension, Compression, and Shear (10/10 holiday break)
Week 6 Axially Loaded Members (10/16, 17 conference break)
Week 7 Torsion
Week 8 Shear Forces and Bending Moments
Week 9 Stresses in Beams
Week 10 Stresses in Beams
Week 11 Midterm exam 
Week 12 Analysis of Stress and Strain
Week 13 Analysis of Stress and Strain
Week 14 Combined loading
Week 15 Combined loading
Week 16 Deflection of beams (12/25 holiday)
Week 17 Deflection of beams (1/1 break)
Week 18 Final exam
scorePolicy: 期中考 (45%)、期末考 (45%)、出缺席與平時表現 (10%)
materials: B.J. Goodno and J.M. Gere (2018) Mechanics of Materials SI 9/e.
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG3：良好健康和福祉（Good Health and Well-being）SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）SDG8：尊嚴就業與經濟發展（Decent Work and Economic Growth）SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）SDG11：永續城市與社區（Sustainable Cities and Communities）
